amendatorysection.para: Sections 54-170 to 54-1,131 shall be known and may be cited as the Livestock Brand Act.

source.note: The Revisor of Statutes has pursuant to section 49-769 correlated LB768, section 1, with LB884, section 1, to reflect all amendments.
Changes made by LB884 became effective July 18, 2014. Changes made by LB768 became operative July 18, 2014.
